corequisites: Students are required to apply for permission to enrol into this subject prior to commencement. Students should make this application via the online Composition Application Form on the following website link: Application Form Link.
name: Composition 1
desc: This subject introduces students to the practices and conventions of musical composition as a personally-directed creative activity. Students create a folio of original music (scores and recordings) including composition projects covering areas of compositional philosophy, technique, directed lis...
